segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Hello sir, main Microsoft se call kar raha hun. Aapke computer mein virus aa gaya hai.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Really? Kaise pata chala? Main toh kuch notice nahi kiya.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Sir, hamare system mein alert aaya hai. Aapko remote access dena hoga check karne ke liye.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Remote access? Yeh safe hai? Main thoda suspicious hun.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Bilkul safe hai sir. Main Microsoft certified engineer hun. Aapko 5000 rupees charge karna hoga service ke liye.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Main payment nahi kar sakta. Aap directly Microsoft website se contact karein.
